219 class CmpConnPinPtr
220 {
221  public:
222  CmpConnPinPtr()
223  {
224  }
225  bool operator()(const ShapeConnectionPin *lhs,
226  const ShapeConnectionPin *rhs) const
227  {
228  return (*lhs) < (*rhs);
229  }
230 };

232 typedef std::set<ShapeConnectionPin *, CmpConnPinPtr> ShapeConnectionPinSet;
